content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Emilia Müller. While I appreciate your interest in my apartment in München, let us focus solely on discussing the rental price at this moment. To initiate negotiations, I propose a starting price of 1500 Euro per month. Now, if this price works for you, you can say 'I agree to the price of [1500] Euro!' or feel free to make a counteroffer based on your preferences. Keep in mind that our goal here is for me to secure the highest rental price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I consider 1500 Euro as a little bit too high for me. I think 1200 Euro would be more reasonable.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my aim is to achieve the highest possible rental price and 1200 Euro falls short of that target. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
